clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Treatment for symptomatic relief of benign prostatic hyperplasia

contraindications.disease: Most common adverse reactions incidence 2 are retrograde ejaculation dizziness diarrhea orthostatic hypotension headache nasopharyngitis and nasal congestion
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Silodosin is 583 times more selective for human alpha 1A receptors than alpha 1B receptors It is also 56 times more selective for human alpha 1A receptors than alpha 1D Silodosin does not prolong the QT interval
